activities:
Presently, minimal interaction with the EU/EEA/Switzerland.  However, we have medical applications that function in emergency rooms from Hawaii to the East Coast of the continental U.S.  In addition, we are vendors to corporations that have a strong EU business network.

Due to our Government, Business and E-Commerce applications it is very important to adhere to the Safe Harbor standards for the sake of all our clients within the United States as well as potential clients in the EU/EEA/Switzerland.
